dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Alright, so, big news coming out of Qatar, actually. The Embassy of Kazakhstan, uh, put out a statement urging their citizens to stay calm.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Alright, so, big news coming out of Qatar, actually. The Embassy of Kazakhstan, uh, put out a statement urging their citizens to stay calm.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Embassy of Kazakhstan in Qatar has urged citizens to remain calm and follow general safety guidelines.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, that's right, Host A. They, like, officially published it on social media on Monday, June 23rd, saying, "Hey, don't panic, it's safe for residents and visitors right now."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, that's right, Host A. They, like, officially published it on social media on Monday, June twenty third, saying, Hey, don't panic, it's safe for residents and visitors right now.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The official statement was published by the diplomatic mission on Monday, June 23, via social media. ... At present, the situation in Qatar is safe for residents and visitors. We ask you not to panic...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, "don't panic" is, uh, always a little bit of a red flag, right? What exactly prompted this statement, do we know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, don't panic is, uh, always a little bit of a red flag, right? What exactly prompted this statement, do we know?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, that's the thing. Remember on Monday, um, Iran actually attacked the U.S. Al-Udeid Air Base there in Qatar.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, that's the thing. Remember on Monday, um, Iran actually attacked the U.S. Al Udeid Air Base there in Qatar.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As a reminder, on Monday, Iran attacked the U.S. Al-Udeid Air Base in Qatar.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, right! The one where, like, people heard loud explosions in Doha and saw flashes in the sky? [interrupts] That's what this is about.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, right! The one where, like, people heard loud explosions in Doha and saw flashes in the sky? That's what this is about.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Loud explosions were heard in the Qatari capital, Doha. Flashes were seen in the sky, presumably from air defense systems...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. Iran's armed forces actually claimed they launched, uh, "powerful and destructive strikes" on the base.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. Iran's armed forces actually claimed they launched, uh, powerful and destructive strikes on the base.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Iran™s armed forces claimed to have launched powerful and destructive strikes on the base.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wow. So, the embassy's trying to calm fears, but also, I heard something about stranded tourists?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow. So, the embassy's trying to calm fears, but also, I heard something about stranded tourists?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, they did. They, um, reminded Kazakhstani tourists that Qatar's airspace is actually fully closed right now. So, people are stuck.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, they did. They, um, reminded Kazakhstani tourists that Qatar's airspace is actually fully closed right now. So, people are stuck.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The embassy reminded Kazakhstani tourists who are currently stranded in Qatar that the country™s airspace is fully closed at the moment.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And what's the plan? Like, are they just, uh, waiting it out?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And what's the plan? Like, are they just, uh, waiting it out?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Pretty much. The embassy said that as soon as flights resume, tour operators will be notified of new dates. They're like, "relevant work is ongoing."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Pretty much. The embassy said that as soon as flights resume, tour operators will be notified of new dates. They're like, relevant work is ongoing.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As soon as flights resume, Kazakhstani tour operators will be notified of new flight dates. Relevant work is ongoing, the diplomatic mission added.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, they're monitoring the situation [overlaps] closely then?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, they're monitoring the situation closely then?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [overlaps] Yeah, really closely. And they're coordinating with authorities from both countries, uh, to ensure citizen safety.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, really closely. And they're coordinating with authorities from both countries, uh, to ensure citizen safety.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The embassy emphasized that it is closely monitoring the situation and, if necessary, will take additional measures in coordination with relevant authorities from both countries to ensure the safety of Kazakhstani citizens.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, their main message is just stay put, basically, until things are stable?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, their main message is just stay put, basically, until things are stable?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That's, uh, pretty much it. "Stay in a safe location until the situation stabilizes," that's what they concluded with.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's, uh, pretty much it. Stay in a safe location until the situation stabilizes, that's what they concluded with.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We ask you to stay in a safe location until the situation stabilizes, the statement concluded.
